value:
Under the long and unjust rule
of Loptr, the people needed
a savior—and cried out for one.

The task thrust upon me has earned
me many sleepless nights. I'd be lost
without the support of my friends.

You seem fatigued... If I could share
my strength with you, I would. As it
is, you'll just have to get some rest.

I never felt like a prince... This feels
as if I'm deceiving people somehow.

When training in Tirnanog as a youth,
Shannan taught me much. Even now,
my body moves on its own in battle...

I am Seliph. I've been sent with
regards from $Nf.

As Baldr's descendant, I shall
do what I must to end suffering...
Father, Mother, watch over me!

With the divine Tyrfing, I will shed
light on the darkness of this world!

I do not fear. Even defeat cannot
extinguish the light.

Thank you. I will do my very best
to perform as you expect of me.

I am Seliph. I will shed light on the
darkness of this world—with strength,
courage, and the divine Tyrfing.

When Emperor Arvis was defeated
in Chalphy, I heard the voices of my
father and mother...$k$pMy father told me to learn to know
the sorrows of the people... At the
time, I didn't understand...$k$pAfter the battle of Grannvale, though,
and having lived here with you and
the other Heroes...I'm starting to.$k$pHaving the heart to understand the
sorrows of others, and giving it form
with your own courage and strength.$k$pThat is what it means to be a Hero,
a true holy knight, the true light...
A gift to those who come after us.$k$pThat is the kind of Hero I want to be.
And I would like for you to help me,
$Nu. Thank you.
はぁっ！
行くぞ！
うああっ！
負けられない…！
I bear the light!
The world made new!
Press on, no regrets!
No more losses!
All their dreams...
はは
I am Seliph. As king of Grannvale, I will build a new world.
Oh, it's you! You gave me a start!
A Legendary Hero? If that is what the people want, then I shall play the role.
People look at me as if... As if they are looking at a god.
Hate your enemy, and see only evil in them... Do that, and the fighting will have no end.
The power of the crusaders was actually that of ancient dragons.
With you here, this world can be saved. That's how I see it, anyway.
Let's try that.
I'll do all I can.
I'll bear this legacy.
